Title: IMDB Sentiment Analysis
Overview: A LSTM model trained to detect the sentiments on movie reviews, trained on the IMDB movie reviews dataset.
Description:
This is an LSTM model made with Tensorflow which takes the input of shape [1,500]
containing data about the movie reviews from IMDB and performs binary classification using
Long Short Term Memory Network and accompolishes the task of getting a deep understanding of
the language in movie reviews and their inferential meanings
